verses.plain: The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.

tokens.t: my shepherd; I shall not want.

verses.plain: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

tokens.t: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

verses.plain: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.

tokens.t: He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake.

verses.plain: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

tokens.t: Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou
with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me.

verses.plain: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.

tokens.t: Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over.

verses.plain: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.

tokens.t: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the

footnotes.text: green…: Heb. pastures of tender grass
for ever: Heb. to length of days
